name: Live Leak - Flat Design
description: There might be some mistakes but I didn't catch any. Btw, MY part of the code has a bunch of notes so its easier for anyone who want's to do it (also it's very neat and tidy... kinda). ALSO sry 1 more thing. Your screen size must be 1204 x 445 and above otherwise it looks like sh!t. ¯\_(ツ)_/¯ You can check your resolution here: http://resizemybrowser.com/

user.name: X_XMarshy
user.about: I make boring websites look modern with Flat Design.
